title: Salon Monetization Configuration
description: Configuration file for salon monetization programs (gift cards, rewards, membership)

_comments.purchaseUrl: Set to null if not available. Platform-hosted checkout URL.
_comments.trackAtCheckout: For rewards programs typically tracked at POS
_comments.utm: Default UTM parameters for all links. Can override per-program.
_comments.allowedDomains: Security: Only these domains allowed for link-outs
_comments.branding: Optional: Customize display names for your brand

other.note: Provide direct URLs from your platform

_setup_instructions.1: Copy this file to your project root or config directory
_setup_instructions.3: Update 'platform' with your salon management system
_setup_instructions.4: Replace 'YOUR_SALON_ID' with your actual salon identifier
_setup_instructions.5: Update all URLs with your platform-specific URLs
_setup_instructions.6: Configure UTM parameters for your analytics
_setup_instructions.7: Add your platform's domains to allowedDomains
